name: Red Rose Mystica - Antoinette - Episode 1 - Begginings
name_original: Red Rose Mystica - Antoinette - Episode 1 - Begginings
description:
Animation - Visual Novel 

Red Rose Mystica - Antoinette - Episode 1

Welcome to the mysterius land of Fuwenia!

There are stories, that in this land there is a Rose, a Red Rose, called “Red Rose Mystica”.

Whoever finds this Rose, if he or she is truly worthy, is able to realize what his heart truly wants…

This, is a story about a girl who was alone, but couldn’t see it..

Her name is,

Antoinette…

Game made by George Katsianos aka Winterwolf Icewind // Rethnar with Visual Novel Maker.

This is a free game.

I hope you enjoy this game!

If you do, let your friends know about it!
